name: electro
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of popular music with a strong fast beat, produced using electronic instruments: Her music is a head-spinning mix of grime, hip-hop, Miami bass, dance-hall, electro, and ragga, to name a few. vintage electro and new wave, like Blondie and the Eurythmics
More examplesFewer examplesThe store sold a selection of the latest electro, break and hip-hop records, plus some disco reissues.The band play a mix of electro, pop, house and techno that gets everyone dancing. Their influences are from the 1970s, but filtered through more modern approaches of dub, electro, techno and drum 'n' bass. This is an up-tempo collection of minimalist electro beats that'll sound great pumping through big speakers on a dance floor.
